"big words"
Is it referring to the developer
Is it referring to the writer

We see this ambiguity in language all the time, like how the phrase "that big of a deal" can mean a small thing, or a big thing.

In short the antecedent of the pronoun is neither the developer nor the writer. However we can't tell which one "big words" refers to.
